main event: On 14 December 1948, several witnesses observed a strange phenomenon in the sky at Rivers Beach, Florida, describing it as a large object resembling a kite.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing a colorful display with reds, blues, and yellows,The object was assessed to be about 20 feet in size,The object was described as silver with a big white spot,Its shape was likened to a large kite,The object displayed unusual maneuverability by dodging, skidding, and speeding up.
sighted object: a large kite-like object with bright colors
